name: Forge scene creation pack
description: Yet another large scene creation kit! This time it's a crafting workshop interior scene. Use the objects to construct unique forge scenes the way you want them. The pack also includes an animated blacksmith character. Use the These speech bubbles might be handy if you want him to talk too.All assets in this pack are one hundred percent vector and can be exported at any resolution. The pack also includes pre exported pngs for quick scene construction.
